docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

This is a big object This is a smaller object 1 This is a smaller object 2

docs.title: Code Blocks in Content Tabs
Admonition
docs.text:
Example off admonition/callout with a title:

Title of the call out

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec pretium bibendum purus, ac pulvinar ex. Proin ornare efficitur nisl feugiat eleifend. Donec eget nisi mi. Duis id lorem pellentesque, suscipit elit at, finibus ex.

docs.title: Code example
docs.text:
Example of Python

add_numbers.py
# Function to add two numbers

def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
return num1 + num2

# Example usage

result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)

Example of HTML

some_random_html_code.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<body>
  <div id="mySidenav" class="sidenav">
    <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="closebtn" onclick="closeNav()"
      >×</a
    >
    <a href="#" onclick="openSubMenu('aboutSubMenu')">About</a>
    <a href="#" onclick="openSubMenu('servicesSubMenu')">Services</a>
    <a href="#" onclick="openSubMenu('clientsSubMenu')">Clients</a>
    <a href="#" onclick="openSubMenu('contactSubMenu')">Contact</a>
  </div>
</body>

docs.title: Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data
